Title: Moving into a new house
Designer: Xie Zhiguang (谢之光)Xie Mulian (谢幕连)Shao Jingyun (邵靓云)
Publisher: Huadong renmin meishu chubanshe, Shanghai (华东人民美术出版社)
Notes: A family moves into a newly built apartment. One of the first things to do is hanging Chairman Mao's portrait in the living room.The housing blocks seen through the window look very much like Caoyang New Village (曹杨), a model project with houses for (model) workers in Shanghai, built around 1952. See: https://everydaylifeinmaoistchina.org/2015/01/30/caoyang-new-village-near-shanghai-1952/
